verses.name: 2 Chronicles 34:16
verses.text: And Shaphan carried the book to the king, and brought the king word back again, saying, All that was committed to thy servants, they do it.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 34:17
verses.text: And they have gathered together the money that was found in the house of the Lord, and have delivered it into the hand of the overseers, and to the hand of the workmen.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 34:18
verses.text: Then Shaphan the scribe told the king, saying, Hilkiah the priest hath given me a book. And Shaphan read it before the king.
